text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to add an extra email address on linkedin?
text.Response A: Sure, I can help you with that. You’ll need to go to the account settings page and click on the “Personal Email” tab.  Then you’ll need to click on the “Add Email Address” button, and enter your new email address.  Once you’ve done that, you can click on the “Save” button to save your changes.
text.Response B: To add an extra email address on LinkedIn, go to your profile, click on the 'Contact and Personal Info' tab, then click on the ‘Add email address’ button. Enter your new email address and click ‘Save’ to add it to your profile.

352.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to add an extra email address on linkedin?

Response A

Sure, I can help you with that. You’ll need to go to the account settings page and click on the “Personal Email” tab. Then you’ll need to click on the “Add Email Address” button, and enter your new email address. Once you’ve done that, you can click on the “Save” button to save your changes.

Response B

To add an extra email address on LinkedIn, go to your profile, click on the 'Contact and Personal Info' tab, then click on the ‘Add email address’ button. Enter your new email address and click ‘Save’ to add it to your profile.
